title: Fundamentals of Earth Observation Data Analysis Using Literate Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Configuring a Jupyter Notebook-based practical learning environment using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can design a text/code-integrated document structure (literate programming) in a Jupyter Notebook environment to explain Earth observation data analysis processes.
Learners can modularize Python functions for visualizing atmospheric composition data and performing statistical analysis to create reusable code.
Learners can document and share analysis processes using Jupyter ecosystem tools (GitHub, Binder, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
